description: Takes a user-uploaded image and regenerates it in Lyzr's brand style using the company's color palette (deep purples, vibrant blues, electric accents, clean gradients) and modern tech-forward aesthetic inspired by www.lyzr.ai. Outputs a styled image using Gemini native image generation.

transformation_description.description: Description of how the image was transformed to match Lyzr brand style

style_elements_applied.description: List of Lyzr brand style elements applied to the image

color_palette_used.description: The specific Lyzr brand colors used in the transformation
